result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant April Patrice Gooden in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pursuant to negotiations, this case is dismissed and read in for sentencing in 14CM4876 and 13CM4391.
Defendant April Patrice Gooden in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases remain in trial posture for 10-28-2015.
JusticePoint Violation Report received and filed. MISSED TELEPHONE contact.  Next telephone contact 8-24-2015.  NO action taken at this time.

Defendant April Patrice Gooden in court with attorney Jeff Allen Schwarz.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.Case was set for scheduling today, however the defendant has 2 additional cases (14CM4876 for jury) and (13CM4391 for plea/sentencing).  The court is informed that there is a new case which involves the same victim.  The state moves for consolidation of all cases which is granted by the court.  The court sets matters for final pretrial and trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 08:15 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 28, 2015 at 08:16 am.

ADDRESS INFO for April Patrice Gooden
Current: 3730 N Port Washington Rd #7, Milwaukee, WI 53208   (Effective: 07-21-2015)
Prior: 8641 West Capitol Drive #f (unknown), Milwaukee, WI 53222

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 3:00 P.M. ON 7/22/15. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Cornelius J.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant April Patrice Gooden in court.  Joanne L Hardtke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has lower number case(s) pending.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Flanagan.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Flanagan, Branch 04.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. 
Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible. The case is adjourned for a Status Conference in Br. 04.
As of August 1, 2015 case will be reassigned to Branch 38, Judge Wagner.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
